scripts.start:reset: npm run kill:all && npm run clean:cache && expo start --clear
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf .expo && rm -rf ios/build && rm -rf android/build && rm -rf android/.gradle
scripts.clean:cache: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/haste-* && watchman watch-del-all
scripts.clean:pods: cd ios && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf build && rm -f Podfile.lock && cd ..
scripts.clean:android: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && rm -rf android/build && rm -rf android/.gradle && rm -rf android/app/build
scripts.clean:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild clean && cd .. && rm -rf ios/build && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/*Numeros*
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:cache && npm run clean:metro && npm run clean:pods && npm run clean:android
scripts.clean:deep: npm run kill:all && npm run clean:all && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.kill:ios: xcrun simctl shutdown all && killall 'Simulator' 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.kill:all: npm run kill:metro && npm run kill:ios && npm run kill:android && npm run kill:watchman
scripts.reset:ios: xcrun simctl shutdown all && xcrun simctl erase all
scripts.reset:android: adb shell pm clear com.artncode.numeros 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.reset:all: npm run reset:ios && npm run reset:android
scripts.reload: npm run kill:metro && npm run start:clean
scripts.reload:hard: npm run kill:all && npm run clean:cache && npm run start
scripts.rebuild:ios: npm run clean:pods && npm run pods:install && npm run ios
scripts.rebuild:android: npm run clean:android && npm run android
scripts.rebuild:all: npm run clean:deep && npm install && npm run prebuild:clean
scripts.fresh: npm run kill:all && npm run clean:all && npm install && npm run start
scripts.fresh:ios: npm run kill:all && npm run clean:all && npm install && npm run prebuild:clean && npm run ios
scripts.fresh:android: npm run kill:all && npm run clean:all && npm install && npm run prebuild:clean && npm run android
